How to get FannJ working in Microsoft Windows.

= Introduction =

These instructions provide step-by-step instructions on how to get FannJ and the FANN library working in Windows.

[FANN http://leenissen.dk/fann/] has pre-built Windows DLLs for FANN version 2.0.0.


= Instructions =
== Step 1 : Install FANN Library ==

  * Visit the Downloads section of the FANN website and download fann-win-dll-2.0.0.zip.  
  * Unzip the file and locate _fann-2.0.0/Microsoft/WindowsDLL/bin/fannfixed.dll_.  
  * Note: This file is also available as a download from the FannJ project site.  
  * Copy _fannfixed.dll_ to _windows\system32\_
